member.summary: This adapter interface definition of MS-SHDACCWS

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.IMS_SHDACCWSAdapter.IsOnlyClient(System.Guid)
member.summary: Specifies whether a co-authoring transition request was made for a document.
member.param: The identifier(Guid) of the document in the server.
member.returns: Whether a co-authoring transition request was made for a document.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.service
member.summary: Web service proxy generated from the full WSDL of MS-SHDACCWS protocol

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.Initialize(Microsoft.Protocols.TestTools.ITestSite)
member.summary: Overrides IAdapter's Initialize method, to set default protocol short name of the testSite.
member.param: A parameter represents a ITestSite instance which is used to get/operate current test suite context.

member.summary: Specifies whether a co-authoring transition request was made for a document.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.SetSoapVersion
member.summary: Set the SOAP version according to the SoapVersion property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.GetTargetServiceUrl
member.summary: A method used to get target service fully qualified URL, it indicates which site the test suite will run on.
member.returns: A return value represents the target service fully qualified URL

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.VerifySchemaOfIsOnlyClientOperation
member.summary: The method is used to capture requirements about schema of IsOnlyClient Operation

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.MS_SHDACCWSAdapter.VerifyTransportProtocol

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.IMS_SHDACCWSSUTControlAdapter.SUTSetCoAuthoringStatus
member.summary: Set the Co-authoring status for the specified file under the specified Document LibraryName list. The specified file is identified by the property "FileIdOfCoAuthoring".
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Protocols.TestSuites.MS_SHDACCWS.IMS_SHDACCWSSUTControlAdapter.SUTSetExclusiveLock
member.summary: Set status of exclusive lock to the specified file which is identified by the property "FileIdOfLock".
member.returns: True if the operation success, otherwise false.
